sentences: Anna Umemiya (梅宮 アンナ, Umemiya Anna, born August 20, 1972) is a Japanese television personality and model.
Born in Tokyo, she is the daughter of a Japanese father and an American mother, herself a former model.
Her father, Tatsuo Umemiya, was an actor, and former original Iron Chef judge.
Umemiya has a daughter, Momoka, by her former husband, identified only as "Mr C", whom she divorced on 28 January 2003 after an 18-month marriage.
Anna: Ai no Nikki (アンナ 愛の日記 (Anna - Diary of Love))
"Minikui Ahiru no Ko" datta Watashi (「みにくいあひるの子」だった私 (I Used to be an Ugly Duckling)) (2001, Kodansha, ISBN 978-4-06-210665-8)
